entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 9.
